timeline.message: Account for possible concurrent topic creation in PubSub topic auto-create functionality.

timeline.bodyText: Could you log a warning here?
timeline.author: elefeint

replies.bodyText:
Why warning level if it's not a real issue?
I would go with DEBUG, or at most INFO.
replies.author: meltsufin

replies.bodyText: Changed level to INFO according to @elefeint comment
replies.author: mvmn
